reviewText: I was really looking forward to viewing this video as my daughter used to dance and I loved her shows and competitions.  I even went out and bought a new video system to accommodate NTSC.  Although I enjoyed what I saw, these confident talented girls, I felt it was far too short.  I wanted to see more.  Especially the younger ones which were hardly shown at all.  I would like to know if there are any more videos of Child Beauty Pageants.  I should have been an adjudicator!

A and E takes you on an adventure in the world of Beauty Pageants, but just not any beauty pageant a children's beauty pageant.  The pageant covered is Universal Miss and Master.  Held in Texas.  It follows the two sisters who have never competed in a pageant of high calibur as this one.  They compete against the best of the best in the Beauty Pageant World.  See if the novice competitiors can beat the pros at their own game!!  I highly recommened this video because it showcasing how pageants are in a positive manner.
